rules.4x4: Place a digit from 1 to 4 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 4 at least once.
rules.5x5: Place a digit from 1 to 5 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 5 at least once.
rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 6 at least once.
rules.7x7: Place a digit from 1 to 7 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 7 at least once.
rules.8x8: Place a digit from 1 to 8 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 8 at least once.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row and column. Each outlined region of more than one cell contains digits from 1 to 9 at least once.
